ygData.subject: Question Regarding Use of RBM Unsupervised Learning as Preprocessing Step
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello! Is anyone aware of prior work done on application of RBM unsupervised learning as a preprocessing step prior to application of NEAT? Thanks, Andy
